short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automation of EA FC WebApp. In case of any questions please contact us on our Discord Server: https://www.discord.gg/RSzCgQF

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FUT Trade Buddy - Autobuyer Chrome Extension

Join Our Thriving Community

FUT Trade Buddy is used by thousands of satisfied users, and you can too! Become part of a vibrant community dedicated to maximizing trading efficiency and success. Bid farewell to manual trading and embrace smarter, faster, and safer deals! Also, you get almost 24/7 live support from our two German developers!

One-Time Payment for EA SPORTS FC!

For an unbelievably affordable price of 19€ per license (or 29€ if you choose the PREMIUM service including technical and installation support), you gain unlimited access to FUT Trade Buddy for the entire duration of the current EA FC Ultimate Team / FIFA season. No hidden fees, no subscriptions - just an incredible deal!

You can also get a 1-day-trial for 5€,-!

Experience a User-Friendly Interface

FUT Trade Buddy offers an intuitive graphical user interface, designed to revolutionize your trading experience supporting multiple languages. It's fast and easy to install!


Discover the power of our Bot functionalities:

- Auto-Buyer: Set up custom filters, and let the Bot automatically buy and sell items directly on the WebApp, giving you a competitive edge in the market.

- Automatic Price Calculation: Our Bot calculates the best selling price for any item in real-time, ensuring maximum profits from your trades.

- Auto-Bidder: Define your bidding settings within the tool, and the Bot will find the perfect items to bid on, saving you time and effort.

- Receive Telegram or Discord Notifications: Stay connected and never miss a beat! Our Bot will send you Telegram or Discord notifications for bought items, WebApp events, and more, keeping you informed and in control.


System Requirements

Compatible with Google Chrome Browser on Windows 10/11, macOS, or Virtual Machine / Server.


Stay in the Loop with Our Discord Server or User-Exclusive Telegram Channel

Join our active Discord or Telegram community for the latest updates, direct communication with our dedicated developers, and a platform to exchange valuable trading insights. Click here to join now: https://discord.gg/PvY2Xp8Csq


Follow Us on Instagram

Stay updated with the latest FUT Trade Buddy news, tips, and success stories by following us on Instagram @fut_tradebuddy. Don't miss out on exclusive content and exciting giveaways!


Get Started Today!

Seize the opportunity to elevate your EA SPORTS FC / FIFA Ultimate Team trading to new heights with FUT Trade Buddy. Experience the power of automation and trade like a pro with ease.


Try FUT Trade Buddy today and see the difference it makes!
